blocks.content: This fully custom web application runs on my local IIS server and is displayed via a Raspberry Pi with a touchscreen. Built with Angular Material and a .NET backend, it serves as a centralized smart home dashboard, integrating seamlessly with multiple IoT APIs:

- Philips Hue
- Samsung SmartThings
- Hydrawise
- OpenMeteo
- Roku

The project showcases real-time device control, environmental monitoring, and media interaction — all through a sleek, responsive interface. It’s a hands-on blend of frontend design, backend integration, and hardware deployment that turns a Raspberry Pi into a powerful home automation hub.
